name: stall-check
prompt: STALL CHECK: Look at active sub-agents. For each, check if their transcript file has grown in the last 5 minutes. If stalled 5+ min, report which ones and suggest respawning. If all healthy or none running, reply HEARTBEAT_OK.

name: status-update
prompt: STATUS UPDATE: Check fleet relay mailbox for unread messages. Check WS inbox for new messages in last 15 min. If new messages found, process them and report. If nothing new, reply HEARTBEAT_OK.
